title: Spark Post
body:
Create stunning graphics - in seconds.
Pick a photo, add text and apply design filters to instantly stand out from the crowd on social.
instruction: Scroll down to see Spark Post functionalities

title: Spark Page
body:
Turn words and images into beautiful web pages - in minutes.
Turn words and images into beautiful, magazine‑style web stories that will impress‑readers‑on‑any device.
pageBody: It can be used for things such as magazine-style travel stories, photo albums, online newsletters, reports, or anything else that you want to present on the web.
instruction: Scroll down to see Spark Page functionalities

title: Spark Video
body:
Create compelling video stories - in minutes.
Easily add photos, video clips, icons, or your own voice. Select from professional-quality soundtracks and cinematic motionâ€”and voila!
pageBody: Create and share compelling videos that extend your reach and inspire your audience to action.
instruction: Scroll down to see Spark Video functionalities
